summary: Thomas snoops on people using their web cams, but when he witnesses a murder he calls the police who discover several women have been murdered in the last years in a similar way.
cast: Edward Furlong|Emilia Fox|Chiwetel Ejiofor|Sara Stewart|Gary Connery|Elsa Zylberstein|Valérie Decobert-Koretzky|Ben Miles|Philip Whitchurch|Peter Wight|Craig Kelly|Maria Pereira de Andrade|Martin Wenner|Victoria Willing|Hannah Eckersley|Sandrine Loisy|Alain Figlarz|Paul Rambaldi|Christophe Bourseiller|James Laurenson|Paul Bazely|Jake Broder|John Guerrasio|Cara Higgins|Adam James|Lara Lee|Nick Lucas|Rebecca Jayne Symons|Donna Ward
keywords: police officer|internet|good cop bad cop|inline skating|hacking
title: Tres ratones ciegos
